message.body: Yo, whats goin on?
in right now, then pick up later for more. That ok with u?
Hi, rhosymedre! I'm sittin' at my desk tryin' to work, and trying to get my typing right on this gadget (frustration). I figure I can chat for about 15m
the time.)
Or bits & pieces scattered thru the day Is something else that I would find OK. (I didn't start this trying for a rhyme But this just happens to me all
Yea of course, its whatevers easiest for you im kinda busy myself. Sorry it took so long to respond by the way, i was just grabbing lunch real quick.
Yeah. I was on hold w an insurance Co on the phone when yr latest txt came in. (Nothing bad, just changing some info) Good thing abt text chat is that
it doesn't have to be instant, as long as both people agree.
Yea totally. Its pretty chill, albeit really impractical when you think about it. As much as i love texting i try to avoid it whenever possible, especia
lly when i have something important to say
e links that are better written than spoken, and better pasted than typed. And of course there's hardmail, on paper.
Makes sense to me. F2f or voice 2 voice (phone or Skype) for interaction. Email for important details I want to review & check b4 sending, or things lik
What a headache! My desk computer's external backup disk here at work has been occasionally deciding not to work. One of our Systems guys has been comin
g over and getting it running again. Now it says "Cannot repair backup disk. Back up all your files as well as you can, reformat this backup drive, and
back them up here."
While I was writing that, he got it fixed. Now "Backing up 1,012,802 items." Jeez Louise.
So, back to the job till I llea e at 6. "Leave"
Sitting in a theater while my friend's band gets ready for a recording session. I felt I needed some relaxation & music (my drug of choice, I call it).
I've got the phone silenced, so I can still text chat
Oh - I may have to turn it off
ive been having problems with and is already a month late got deleted off the server, so i had to apologise to my professor and start the project comple
Okay cool, do what you gotta do. Sorry i havent been very chatty, today has been really taxing for me :/ my mum is selling the house and while moving fu
rniture my granddad broke my bookshelf, which is really upsetting for me because my father and i built it from scratch. Then i find out my project that
tely over for the nth time.
Holy mackerel, that's a load of headaches! (Yr txts came in as a bunch of fragments & I had to figure our their order - not yr fault)
g. Hows your friends recording session?
Its all good. Its just been a long day. Im finishing up with some stuff and then my guy and i are prolly gonna head home and play videogames or somethin
They're just doing sound checks.
Now they've started. WOW!
what band if you dont mind my asking?
I've just been enjoying / enjoyed by a large lapful of purrrr. Σ:•X3
I only got like half of that haha. My guy and i are eating icecream and playing kingdom hearts, its really chill
